summary: The federal government needs a qualified, well-trained cybersecurity workforce to protect vital IT systems. Not having enough of these workers is one reason why securing federal systems is on our High Risk list . To help agencies identify their critical workforce needs, they were required to identify and categorize all of their IT and cyber-related positions. However, most of the agencies we reviewed likely miscategorized...
title: Cybersecurity Workforce: Agencies Need to Accurately Categorize Positions to Effectively Identify Critical Staffing Needs
